Bimbo Oshin, nke a makwaara dị ka Abimbola Oshin (amụrụ na 24 Julaị 1971) bụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, onye n'emepụta ihe, n'onye ọchụnta ego si na Naijiria.
A mụrụ Oshin na 24 Julaị 1971 na Ondo Steeti ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ asatọ Pa Olasanmi Theophilus Oshin, nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ. Oshin gara Mahadum Lagos ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) na nkà ihe ọmụma. Oshin malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1996 mana ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Yoruba nke afọ 2012 nke akpọrọ Omo Elemosho
Oshin tolitere na Ondo Steeti ebe ọ gara agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Saint Anne's Primary School
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara Staff Primary School na Ifẹ, Osun Steeti
Maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gara Girls Academy, Sandgrouse dị na Lagos Steeti
Oshin gara maka agụmakwụkwọ ka elu na Mahadum Lagos, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (B.A) na nkà ihe ọmụma.
Ịhụnanya Oshin nwere maka ime ihe nkiri malitere mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ n'eme obere ihe nkiri n'ụlọ ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye ebe ha dekọrọ vidiyo ha
Mana ọrụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri malitere na mbụ n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos
Nwanne enyi ya nwanyị mere ka ọ mata otu a na-akpọ Ara Osan

Ọ gwara ya na ya esonyegoro ndị otu,  na ya onwe ya ga-esonyekwa.
Oshin kwetara, sonyere ndị otu ahụ (Ara Osan) n'afọ 1996 wee malite ịga maka mmegharị
Otu ihe nkiri Ara Osan bụ otu nke Rasaq Ajao nwere, ọ nọrọ afọ anọ n'okpuru onye isi ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri operas ncha Bekee mana ugbu a, [mgbe?] ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba n'emekwa nke ọma
Ihe nkiri mbụ e wepụtara nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama bụ nke akpọrọ Akobi n'afọ 1997.
N'afọ 2016, e nyere ya ihe nrite Icon Category Award na 2016 Afro-Heritage Broadcasting and Entertainment and Awards.
